flavor: "By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth!"
name: Doctor Strange
text: Spell Mastery — Action: Exhaust Doctor Strange and pay the cost of the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck → resolve the "Special" ability on that card.

name: Stephen Strange
text: Stephen Strange begins the game with an [[Invocation]] deck. (See insert.) Natural Talent — Action: Discard the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "The oath I swore to protect my master overrides all other directives."
name: Wong
text: Action: Exhaust Wong → choose to either heal 1 damage from your identity or discard the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck.

name: Astral Projection
text: Hero Action (thwart): Choose a scheme → remove 3 threat from that scheme and look at the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon on that card, remove 1 additional threat from the chosen scheme.

name: Magic Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy and discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Stun that enemy. [energy] - Deal 2 damage to that enemy. [mental] - Confuse that enemy. [wild] - All of the above.

flavor: "Nothing is impossible for the Sorcerer Supreme!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Master of the Mystic Arts
text: Hero Action: Pay the printed cost of the top card of the [[Invocation]] deck → resolve its "Special" ability. Then, place it back on top of the [[Invocation]] deck faceup.

flavor: "I believe observation and knowledge must precede action." -- Doctor Strange
name: Mystical Studies
text: Alter-Ego Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a Doctor Strange card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "This is one of the first spells I learned." -- Doctor Strange
name: Protective Ward
text: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel all of its effects and discard it.

flavor: "A bit ostentatious for Bleecker Street." -- Zelma Stanton
name: Sanctum Sanctorum
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Sanctum Sanctorum → shuffle a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile into your deck and draw 1 card.

flavor: "If you're gonna call yourself 'The Sorcerer Supreme', then you really should have a flying cloak." -- Spider-Man
name: Cloak of Levitation
text: You gain the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Action: Exhaust Cloak of Levitation → ready Doctor Strange.

name: Magical Enhancements
text: Play under any player's control. Your hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, discard Magical Enhancements.

flavor: "The Eye of Agamotto will reveal the truth." -- Doctor Strange
name: The Eye of Agamotto
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust The Eye of Agamotto → generate a [wild] resource.

flavor: "My name is Jericho Drumm. They call me Brother Voodoo."
name: Brother Voodoo
text: Response: After Brother Voodoo enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "I come from what you call the Dark Dimension. I don't frighten easily."
name: Clea
text: Interrupt: When Clea is defeated, shuffle her into her owner's deck.

name: Iron Fist
text: Iron First enters play with 2 mystic counters on him. Response: When Iron Fist attacks an enemy, remove 1 mystic counter from him → stun that enemy and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Desperate Defense
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +2 DEF for that attack. If you take no damage from that attack, ready your hero.

flavor: "Have a seat!" -- Colleen Wing
name: Momentum Shift
text: Hero Action (attack): Heal 2 damage from your hero → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: The Night Nurse
text: Uses (3 medical counters). Action: Exhaust The Night Nurse and remove 1 medical counter from her → heal 1 damage from a hero and discard 1 status card from it.

name: Unflappable
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you defend against an attack and take no damage, exhaust Unflappable → draw 1 card.

flavor: "Incoming!" -- Iron Man
name: Warning
text: Interrupt (defense): When a hero would take any amount of damage, reduce that amount by 1.

flavor: "The mantle of Sorcerer Supreme was bestowed upon me by the Ancient One." -- Stephen Strange
name: The Sorcerer Supreme
text:
Play only if you have the [[Mystic]] trait.
You get +1 hand size while in hero form.

flavor: "That should hold him for a spell." -- Doctor Strange
name: Crimson Bands of Cyttorak
text: Special: Stun an enemy and deal 7 damage to it. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "You see only what I want you to see." -- Doctor Strange
name: Images of Ikonn
text: Special: Confuse the villain and remove 4 threat from a scheme. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "Let the Rings of Raggadorr shield you from harm!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Seven Rings of Raggadorr
text: Special: Give up to 3 characters each a tough status card. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "By the Vapors of Valtorr, be transformed!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Vapors of Valtorr
text: Special: Choose a status card in play. Replace that status card with a different status card. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "By the blessed Vishanti!" -- Doctor Strange
name: Winds of Watoomb
text: Special: Draw 3 cards. Place this card in the [[Invocation]] deck discard pile.

flavor: "You have much to learn." -- Karnak
name: Skilled Strike
text: Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, it gets +2 ATK for that attack.

flavor: "Not this time, Kingpin!" -- Spider-Man
name: Foiled!
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup during a scheme activation, cancel its boost icons.

flavor: "I've got an idea for how to make this suit even better."
name: Iron Man
text: Reduce the cost to play each upgrade on Iron Man by 1.
